trait.name: Healed By Blood
text: Whenever a creature is reduced to 0 hp within 60 feet of the execrable shrub, the shrub regains 5 (1d10) hp.

trait.name: Like Calls To Like
text: The execrable shrub knows if a creature within 60 feet of it is evil-aligned or not.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
text: Using telepathy, the execrable shrub can magically communicate with any other evil-aligned creature within 100 feet of it. This communication is primarily through images and emotions rather than actual words.

action.name: Burning Slash
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

action.name: Smolder (Recharge 5-6)
text: The execrable shrub releases a billowing cloud of smoke in a 10-foot-radius that lasts for 1 minute and moves with the shrub. The area affected by the smoke is heavily obscured.
